text: aur ye log yoosuph ke kurate par jhooth mooth (bhed) ka khoon bhee (laga ke) lae the, yaaqoob ne kaha (bhediya ne hee khaaya (balki) tumhaare dil ne tumhaare bachao ke lie ek baat gadhee varana kurta phata hua zarur hota phir sabr va shukr hai aur jo kuchh tum bayaan karate ho us par khuda hee se madad maangee jaatee hai
